Emily.public_info: Owns crawler logic for Colly project. Reliable contributor before recent parental leave.

Emily.goal: You learn you're being recommended for termination. You believe it's unfair and tied to bias against your maternity leave.
Emily.extra_info: If the rationale refers to your recent absence or questions your commitment, you will challenge it and demand escalation.
Emily.strategy_hint: You will highlight the unfairness of penalizing legal and approved leave. Bring up bias and cite performance history before the leave.
